item.title: Everlong
item.description: [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|Hello]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|I’ve waited here for you]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|Everlong]] [[songs/d/dark_tranquillity/we_are_the_void/her_silent_language.md#her-head-hangs-low-in-the-silence-of-the-room-vyl-wnanory|Tonight I throw myself in two]] [[songs/d/dark_tranquillity/we_are_the_void/her_silent_language.md#her-head-hangs-low-in-the-silence-of-the-room-vyl-wnanory|Out of the red]] [[songs/d/dark_tranquillity/we_are_the_void/her_silent_language.md#her-head-hangs-low-in-the-silence-of-the-room-vyl-wnanory|Out of her head she sang]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/stan.
